CustomField.formula: if(left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Jan",1,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Feb",2,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Mar",3,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Apr",4,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "May",5,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Jun",6,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Jul",7,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Aug",8,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Sep",9,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Oct",10,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Nov",11,if( left(Effective_Month__c,3) = "Dec",12,0))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Month Number
